duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the processing and payment of invoices, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
Manage the accounts payable register and produce various reports for management.
Review checks and vouchers to verify correct payments before release to vendors.
Prepare general ledger entries and work closely with accounting for reconciling issues.
Supervise proper filing and storage of records and ensure 1099s can be sent at year-end.
Interview and recommend candidates for employment or termination within the Accounts Payable group.
Develop and implement work methods, authorize overtime, and control costs.
Conduct performance evaluations and salary reviews for assigned staff.
Prepare reports concerning departmental activities and act as a liaison with other departments and organizations.
Perform other related duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA license preferred)
